casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Daryl PETITT Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 18, 2018

Daniel J. Foster, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

James M. Ralls, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 443, 175 A.3d 1274 (2017), is denied.
